responsibilities: Developed a dynamic customer onboarding tool using Node.js and React, resulting in a <mark>30%</mark> increase in speed and <mark>$10,000-$20,000</mark> increase in revenue.
Led end-to-end research and development efforts to convert proof-of-concepts to functional tools, enabling customization such as autosave, type selection, drag-and-drop, and multi-level reordering.
Trained a 3-member team on React, Node.js, and PostgreSQL, resulting in saved training and consulting costs worth <mark>$2,000-$4,000 per member</mark>.
Redesigned the hotel cancellation pipeline, automating bulk cancellation for 800+ clients and saving <mark>~$500 per customer per day</mark> in hotel reimbursements.

Improved customer-service <mark>turnaround time by 90%</mark> using cloud-based functions with BigQuery, leading to retention of <mark>500 successful transactions per day</mark> generating <mark>$180,000 in gross revenue annually</mark>.

Enhanced the booking experience through flexible date customization, resulting in a <mark>20% increase in conversion rate, 80% increase in engagement</mark> and a team <mark>revenue boost of ~$17,000 annually</mark>.
Led testing and debugging efforts, <mark>saving 4.5 hours</mark> of testing effort per release.
Designed a tool for monitoring and redirecting AWS Direct Connect traffic during AWS Health events, resulting in a reduction of time from <mark>45 minutes to 2 minutes</mark>.
Developed lambda functions to update database entries and SNS trigger for AWS Health, <mark>reducing downtime by 20%</mark> and <mark>saving $2,500</mark> in costs.

Refactored and automated the employee onboarding process, reducing duration from <mark>2 days to 30 minutes, saving $1,000 per employee</mark>, and providing managers with visibility into onboarding progress.
